name: Sally Stitches: Light of Dawn (Demo)
description:
For thousands of years, aliens have been living on Earth. Having abandoned their spacefaring ways, they sought to live in peace with humanity. 

But peace never came. A new threat has emerged, forcing the aliens into hiding.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sally Stitches: Light of Dawn is a turn-based adventure game about a robot trying to protect aliens from being captured by the Alien Extermination Program.

 This is the first game I've ever really made. I don't know how long it will be before the full game comes out, so please be patient. The intention of this demo is to obtain feedback and bug repots, so any comments would be appreciated. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Select

X- Cancel

C - Pause

Esc - Quit
